title-group.article-title: The Ethics of the Melancholic Witness: Janet Frame and W.G. Sebald

abstract.p: This essay examines how two twentieth-century writers, Janet Frame and W.G. Sebald, represent the ethical responsibilities of the witness in relation to melancholia.
